Q-Trust.text:
Well, that will come with time.

Just get the flowers.
Four, please.

Q-Questions.text:
Oh nonononono

We'll be here all day if you keep asking questions!

All we need is four flowers for the funeral, and maybe some chamomile if you can find any.

I know what you want to ask:

"Where am I?"
"Who are you?"
"Why am I here?"
"Why is everything the same color?"

Just enjoy the moment, and accept that I don't know the answers to any of your questions.

S4D2-Talking.text:
. . .

.  .  .  .  .

Ok, fair enough.

Just find the flowers, please.  My small mammalian brain can only handle so much conversation.

S4-Brought.text:
Oh, no.

Absolutely not.

What I meant was..

the GENERAL sense of "brought".

One can bring oneself to a location using their own power, and they were still "brought" there.

But part of not knowing how you were brought here means I also don't know if you were brought by yourself or brought by others.

So maybe you WERE "brought" here.

But I wouldn't know.

replies.text: Okay, I'm just going to go look for the flowers.
You're sounding more and more suspicious with every sentence.

S4D-Suspicion.text:
Look.

Level with me.

We've been at this back and forth for what, five, six hours?

Aren't you getting tired of arguing with me?  Can't we just reach a point of stability and cooperate on a rather minor task?

replies.text: We haven't been talking for nearly that long.
Alright, you have a point.  We should cooperate if we want to enjoy ourselves.

H-OnIt.text:
Great.
Four flowers should be enough.

One for the world.

One for God.

[anim Sneeze]And two for me and you.

replies.text: Indubitably.  There are no points more excellent than mine.
Ok but seriously answer the question.

Questions.text:
Hello again.
Do you need help finding the flowers?

replies.text: Yeah, I'm having trouble finding anything.  Or really seeing anything.
Okay, I just have a few more questions...

Home.text:
Oh good, you're awake.

[anim Sneeze]Could you get us some flowers?
I want to make a wreath.

And if you find some chamomile, I'll whip us up some tea.

replies.text: It wouldn't kill you to say "Please".

RequirementsMet.text:
[anim Sneeze]Oh good, you found the flowers.

Let's hold the funeral.

replies.text: Actually, I'm going to look for that chamomile.

Optional.text:
Oh, splendid!

You even found the tea!

[defer event tea_party][give tea]We'll have a wonderful tea party with this.

S-Where.text:
You're in a simulated environment.

It's low-stress.

It's gluten-free.

It's everything you'd need.
More or less...

replies.text: That's not much of an answer.

S3DS-Arrived.text:
. . .

Yes, as a matter of fact.

I have no idea how I got here,

or how you got here,

or how anyone or anything got here.

So let's just cut this chat short and look for some flowers.  We're holding a funeral this afternoon and I don't want to attend without a wreath for the grave.

replies.text: Okay I'm gonna go find the flowers or whatever.

SD2-ActualAnswer.text: I would if I could, but I can't.

replies.text: Alright.  I'll drop it for now and just look for the flowers.

S3D-HorseShit.text:
There's no need for such language.

I know you're confused, but I'm here, as well, aren't I?  Have you even considered the possibility that I just suddenly found my self here the same way you did?

Q-Finding.text:
It's easy to miss things, especially when they're near walls or low to the ground.

You'll have a much clearer view of the area from up high or down low.

S4C-Looking.text:
Please do.

Oh, and some chamomile if you can find any.

Q-Task.text:
[anim Sneeze]You're completely hopeless

I need four flowers to make a wreath because we're having a funeral.

They should be around here somewhere.
They wouldn't call this a forest if there weren't any flowers.  That's against the rules.

Oh, and some chamomile would be lovely, but don't trouble yourself too much if you can't find any.

S3C-Smarter.text:
Why thank you.

But flattery won't get you anywhere.
All I want are some flowers for the funeral.

How could I possibly grieve without flowers?  It would be a mockery of the ritual.

D1-Kill.text: You don't know that, and I'm not about to find out.

replies.text: So are you going to give an actual answer?
Yes.  It really is an excellent point.

S3H-Fair.text:
Yes
Exactly
Thank you for being agreeable

So how about we cut this chat short and look for flowers?

I'd like to have this funeral concluded before the sun sets.

S3-From.text:
How would I know?  I'm just a deer.

THE deer, I mean.

There aren't any other deer, but if there were, I can assure you I would have average intelligence among a representative sample, and thus neither know nor could articulate the means by which you were brought here.

replies.text: I suspect you're a bit smarter than the average deer.
